title: Updating tools versions. Min-sdk is now 16 (Android 4.1, Jellybean).
message:
Updating tools versions. Min-sdk is now 16 (Android 4.1, Jellybean).

Usage statisitics show almost no one is using v15, Android 4.0, so
dropping them makes little difference. Sadly, more people are using
v2, Android 2.2!

title: Change text size on map, and when we start showing text.
message:
Change text size on map, and when we start showing text.

Make text a big bigger, and show more info on earlier zooms.

title: Fix red highlighting of realtime minutes.
message:
Fix red highlighting of realtime minutes.

Delay formatting the values, so we can compare the integer values,
rather than poking around with ascii characters.

title: Fix realtime time differences.
message:
Fix realtime time differences.

Discrepancy caused by the app showing departure times, but the
realtime data is based on arrival times, and sometimes they differ.
This was introducing a small error into the calculated realtime
differences. Stop 1907 is currently a good test.
Also was not correctly setting the displayed field to blank when
there is no RT data, so it was sometimes displaying an old string.

title: Always show a sign with formatted minutes. Fix crash when trying to
message:
Always show a sign with formatted minutes. Fix crash when trying to

title: Separate parts of 24hr time with a colon instead of `h'.
message:
Separate parts of 24hr time with a colon instead of `h'.
When showing time differences, minutes >= 60 are split into hours
& minutes part, separated by `h', thus the first change.
Include a function for formatting minutes correctly using this.
Fix calculation of time differences to be correct, hopefully, in
case it wasn't before.
ServiceCalendar apparently got reformatted?
